Ingredients.3: 0.25 cup Italian-style bread crumbs (such as Vigo®)

Ingredients.4: 0.25 cup freshly grated Pecorino Romano cheese

Ingredients.5: 1 (9 ounce) package refrigerated spinach and mozzarella ravioli

Directions.1: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) according to manufacturer's instructions.

Directions.2: Beat egg and water together in a small bowl. Combine bread crumbs and Pecorino Romano cheese on a plate. Dip 1 ravioli into beaten egg mixture, then into bread crumb mixture, pressing to coat. Place breaded ravioli on a plate and repeat with remaining ravioli. Lightly spray ravioli with cooking spray.

Directions.3: Place as many ravioli in the air fryer basket as you can without overlapping them.

Directions.4: Cook in the preheated air fryer for 6 minutes; flip ravioli using tongs and cook for 4 minutes more. Remove from the air fryer and repeat with remaining ravioli. Serve with your favorite marinara sauce for dipping.
